appDesc.message: Stands AdBlocker – it's a free ad blocker for YouTube, Twitch, Pop-Ups, Video Ads, and websites. Block ads everywhere with Stands!

block_popups_on_this_site.message: Bloqueja les finestres emergents en aquest lloc

blocking_statistics_text.message: Here you have historical data about how many ads were blocked over a certain period.

cookie_banners_allowed_add_sites.message: Afegiu llocs on preferiu que es mostrin avisos de galetes

cookie_banners_tooltip.message: Bloqueja les notificacions de galetes a tots els llocs web. Tingueu en compte que encara poden aparèixer algunes notificacions de galetes, ja que són essencials per al bon funcionament de determinats llocs web.

feedback_screen_text.message: We would like to hear your thoughts, suggestions, concerns or problems with anything so we can improve!

hide_cookie_banners_on_this_site.message: Amaga el banner de galetes en aquest lloc

include_current_url.message: Include current URL in the report

no_more_cookie_banners_text1.message: Stands AdBlocker ja bloqueja anuncis i finestres emergents no desitjades. Ara també amagarem els banners de galetes acceptant només galetes essencials i funcionals per a vostè.

no_more_cookie_banners_text2.message: Podeu canviar aquesta configuració en qualsevol moment. Més detalls estan disponibles

no_more_cookie_banners_title.message: No hi ha més finestres emergents de galetes

no_more_cookie_banners_yes_button.message: Sí, bloqueja els banners de galetes

popup_allowed_add_sites.message: Add sites with allowed popups using the form below.

popups_tooltip.message: By default popups are blocked on all sites, you can allow popups on specific sites

rate_stands_adblocker.message: Like Stands AdBlocker? A quick rating would mean a lot!

report_issue_text.message: We are sorry to hear that something isn’t right. Please tell us about it and we’ll fix it.

stands_is_paused.message: STANDS is paused on all sites

tracking_tooltip.message: Protect your privacy from thousands of web tracking scripts and third parties

turn_on_blocking_on_this_site.message: Activa el bloqueig d'anuncis en aquest lloc

whitelisted_text.message: Here you can manage your whitelist. When a site is whitelisted, Stands is completely disabled on that site, no blocking of any kind and no placement of ads that sponsor your cause.

you_blocked_ads_popups.message: Your browsing just got cleaner! We've blocked $ads$ ads and $popups$ pop-ups.
